Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to govern Copilot agent development in your environments and enforce governance policies for Copilot agents. This feature will reach general availability on July 31, 2025.

How does this affect me?
This feature introduces controls that will allow you to enforce Microsoft Entra ID authentication or disable anonymous access and enforce your preferred authentication method to enhance your organization security.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Power Platform admin center - Manage agent security with enhanced admin controls
